value, typedef = value_typedef
with pytest.raises(TypeError):
    validations.validate_argument(value, typedef)
pytest.mark.parametrize('value_typedef', [(True, default_str), (10.5,
    default_int), ('abc', default_bool), (5, default_list_int), ([1.5, 2.5],
    default_list_int), (['ab', 'cd'], default_list_bool), ([True, False],
    default_list_str), (5, default_dict_int), ({'a': 1.5, 'b': 2.5},
    default_dict_int), ({'a': 'a', 'b': 'b'}, default_dict_bool), ({'a': 
    True, 'b': False}, default_dict_str)])
